content: Continuing from this thread, #12617 is running into some weirdness around linear maps where expressions like monomial s a with a : R do not elaborate because lean can't work out how to coerce monomial s to a function as it can't work out the appropriate Semiring R to use, but it can't infer it from a because it doesn't know that it's being applied as a function yet.
(I've just rebased the PR on 4.7.0 to see if this is a regression)
